name: Childrens Painting Game
description:
A Painting Box Game With Multiple Level types i created for my Daughter while learning about Virtual Texturing.

Currently the Images are only Paw Patrol (Her Favorite Show) But I am willing to add more to the Project if people wanted it. 

Ran into odd texture issues in the outlining of the pictures when setting up for Mobile and Painting on the canvas. I would like to fix this and when i do i will release a mobile version as well!
